about_the_game:
Embark on an RPG-infused fishing simulation game where your angling dreams come true! Yearning to catch the big one? Look no further! With impeccable controls and player-centric management, this game is your answer. If real-life constraints like scarce resources, unfamiliarity with tackle setup, disapproving partners, or lack of free time have kept you from indulging in a fishing frenzy, we're here to fulfill that thrill. Get ready for a satisfying escape into the digital realm!

Our game was conceived with the primary goal of enabling all players to venture through the vast landscapes of our nation, right from the comfort of their screens, during their leisure hours. Immerse yourself in diverse regional cultures and landscapes while pursuing a myriad of uniquely characteristic and powerful fish species. Within the game, players can revel in the joy of free exploration, delving deep into the rich ecosystems of various waters and capturing over a hundred species of actual fish.

Advance your fishing skills, acquire new gear, and participate in rewarding events to experience a fishing atmosphere like never before. Our aspiration is to gift you an unparalleled immersive experience that transcends the ordinary. Get set for an adventure that brings the thrill of the catch and the serenity of nature's beauty, all within the virtual world we've meticulously crafted for you.

short_description: Fishing Fishing is a first person fishing simulation role-playing game where you will travel to multiple provinces in China, experience different scenery and cuisine, and use a variety of fishing gear to fight against big fish.
